an3.92:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati sigham sigham khettam sukattham karoti sumatikatam.
an3.92:1.4: Sigham sigham khettam sukattham karitva sumatikatam sigham sigham bijani patitthapeti.
an3.92:1.5: Sigham sigham bijani patitthapetva sigham sigham udakam abhinetipi apanetipi.
an3.92:1.6: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini kassakassa gahapatissa accayikani karaniyani.
an3.92:1.7: Tassa kho tam, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa natthi sa iddhi va anubhavo va:
an3.92:1.8: ‘ajjeva me dhannani jayantu, sveva gabbhini hontu, uttarasveva paccantu’ti.
an3.92:1.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yam tassa kassakassa gahapatissa tani dhannani utuparinamini jayantipi gabbhinipi honti paccantipi.
an3.92:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tinimani bhikkhussa accayikani karaniyani.
an3.92:2.4: imani kho, bhikkhave, tini bhikkhussa accayikani karaniyani.
an3.92:2.5: Tassa kho tam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno natthi sa iddhi va anubhavo va:
an3.92:2.6: ‘ajjeva me anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccatu sve va uttarasve va’ti.
an3.92:2.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yam tassa bhikkhuno adhisilampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipannampi sikkhato anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati.
an3.92:3.2: ‘tibbo no chando bhavissati adhisilasikkhasamadane, tibbo chando bhavissati adhicittasikkhasamadane, tibbo chando bhavissati adhipannasikkhasamadane’ti.
